data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 645,213, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bengbu, Anhui, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Bengbu that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Bengbu to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 53,907 believers living in the county of Bengbu. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 53,907 believers in the county of Bengbu.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Bengbu that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bengbu, Anhui, China has a population of 710,600.

We estimate Bengbu has 53,907 people who might know Jesus, 11,480 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 645,213 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Bengbu.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
